latency_p95.description:
**What**: p95 portfolio refresh latency.
**Why**: P95 protects tail users and API spikes.
**Act**: If >1500ms for 5m → check exchange status, rate limits, and executor logs.

**Runbook**: [Click here](/d/ops-runbook) for detailed troubleshooting.

error_rate.description:
**What**: Per-exchange error/s by error_type.
**Why**: Early indication of auth/rate/timeout issues.
**Act**: Spikes in auth → rotate keys; ratelimit → raise refresh interval; timeout → network/DNS checks.

**Error Types**: auth (401/403), ratelimit (429), timeout (network), server (5xx), unknown

**Runbook**: [Click here](/d/ops-runbook)

total_value.description:
**What**: Sum of USD value across exchanges.
**Why**: Drift check after connector changes.
**Act**: Sudden >10% drop → verify price feed and symbol mapping.

**Validation**: Compare with exchange UI manually if anomaly detected.

**Runbook**: [Click here](/d/ops-runbook)

staleness.description:
**What**: Seconds since last successful refresh.
**Why**: Detects stuck fetchers.
**Act**: >300s → restart executor or inspect connectors; see runbook §Staleness.

**Target**: <60s steady-state, investigate if >120s

**Runbook**: [Click here](/d/ops-runbook)

asset_count.description:
**What**: Number of non-zero assets.
**Why**: Sanity for permissions & parsing.
**Act**: 0 for >5m → recheck API permissions ("read only" but enabled).

**Expected**: Binance typically 3-10 assets, BTCTurk 2-5 assets

**Runbook**: [Click here](/d/ops-runbook)

usage: Copy 'description' field to corresponding panel in dashboard JSON
